languages.text: "Тебе хорошо говорить, Амик'Абеляр. Тебя Неумирающий скоро призовет, а сколько нам терпеть этого... союзника..." {n}Кибелла мрачно вздыхает.{/n}
"It is easy for you to say, Amic'Abelard. The Undying One will call upon you soon, but for how long are the rest of us supposed to tolerate this... ally..." {n}Kibellah sighs sullenly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Тебе хорошо говорить, Амик'Абеляр. Тебя Неумирающий скоро призовет, а сколько нам терпеть этого... союзника..." {n}Кибелла мрачно вздыхает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "It is easy for you to say, Amic'Abelard. The Undying One will call upon you soon, but for how long are the rest of us supposed to tolerate this... ally..." {n}Kibellah sighs sullenly.{/n}

"It is easy for you to say, Amic'Abelard. The Undying One will call upon you soon, but for how long are the rest of us supposed to tolerate this... ally..." {n}Kibellah sighs sullenly.{/n}

languages.text: «Para usted es fácil decirlo, Amic'Abelard. El Inmortal no tardará en llamarle, pero ¿cuánto tiempo tendremos que aguantar los demás a este... aliado?». {n}Kibellah suspira, taciturna.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is easy for you to say, Amic'Abelard. The Undying One will call upon you soon, but for how long are the rest of us supposed to tolerate this... ally..." {n}Kibellah sighs sullenly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Para usted es fácil decirlo, Amic'Abelard. El Inmortal no tardará en llamarle, pero ¿cuánto tiempo tendremos que aguantar los demás a este... aliado?». {n}Kibellah suspira, taciturna.{/n}

languages.text: 「アベラルド、あなたは気楽でしょう。不死の者はすぐにあなたを呼び寄せるだろう。だが、私たちはいつまでこの…盟友を容認すればいいんだ」{n}キベラは不機嫌そうにため息をついた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is easy for you to say, Amic'Abelard. The Undying One will call upon you soon, but for how long are the rest of us supposed to tolerate this... ally..." {n}Kibellah sighs sullenly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「アベラルド、あなたは気楽でしょう。不死の者はすぐにあなたを呼び寄せるだろう。だが、私たちはいつまでこの…盟友を容認すればいいんだ」{n}キベラは不機嫌そうにため息をついた。{/n}

languages.text: “你说得倒是轻巧，信者阿贝拉德，毕竟不死之神很快就会呼唤你的名字。然而，我们其他人还要忍受这位……盟友……还要忍受多久？”{n}绮贝菈闷闷不乐地叹了口气。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is easy for you to say, Amic'Abelard. The Undying One will call upon you soon, but for how long are the rest of us supposed to tolerate this... ally..." {n}Kibellah sighs sullenly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你说得倒是轻巧，信者阿贝拉德，毕竟不死之神很快就会呼唤你的名字。然而，我们其他人还要忍受这位……盟友……还要忍受多久？”{n}绮贝菈闷闷不乐地叹了口气。{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr habt leicht reden, Amic'Abelard. Der Todlose wird Euch bald rufen, aber wir lange der Rest von uns diesen ... Verbündeten ... noch tolerieren muss ..." {n}Kibellah seufzt missmutig.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is easy for you to say, Amic'Abelard. The Undying One will call upon you soon, but for how long are the rest of us supposed to tolerate this... ally..." {n}Kibellah sighs sullenly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt leicht reden, Amic'Abelard. Der Todlose wird Euch bald rufen, aber wir lange der Rest von uns diesen ... Verbündeten ... noch tolerieren muss ..." {n}Kibellah seufzt missmutig.{/n}

languages.text: « C'est facile à dire pour vous, Amic'Abélard. L'Immortel vous rappellera bientôt à Lui, mais nous autres, combien de temps devrons-nous tolérer la présence de ce prétendu... allié ? » {n}Kibellah pousse un soupir maussade.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is easy for you to say, Amic'Abelard. The Undying One will call upon you soon, but for how long are the rest of us supposed to tolerate this... ally..." {n}Kibellah sighs sullenly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est facile à dire pour vous, Amic'Abélard. L'Immortel vous rappellera bientôt à Lui, mais nous autres, combien de temps devrons-nous tolérer la présence de ce prétendu... allié ? » {n}Kibellah pousse un soupir maussade.{/n}

languages.text: "Senin için söylemesi kolay Amik'Abelard. Ölmeyen yakında seni çağıracak. Fakat geri kalanımızın bu... Müttefike... Ne kadar süre katlanması gerektiğine gelirsek..." {n}Kibellah, kasvetli bir şekilde iç çekiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is easy for you to say, Amic'Abelard. The Undying One will call upon you soon, but for how long are the rest of us supposed to tolerate this... ally..." {n}Kibellah sighs sullenly.{/n}
